interpretation:
The "sad but relieved face" emoji portrays a mixture of emotions - a combination of sadness and relief. This card suggests that you may be going through a difficult time in your life, but there is a light at the end of the tunnel. You may have recently experienced a setback, disappointment, or loss, but you are slowly moving towards acceptance and healing. You are acknowledging your pain and allowing yourself to grieve, but you are also finding comfort in the fact that things will get better. 

This card can also indicate a period of reflection and introspection. You may be taking the time to evaluate your life and your choices, and to come to terms with your feelings. It's important to give yourself permission to feel your emotions and to express them in a healthy way. Remember that it's okay to not be okay, and that healing takes time.
